title: The Changing Cannabis Narrative With Debra Borchardt
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Debra Borchardt is CEO, co-founder and Editor-in-Chief of the cannabis financial news website Green Market Report. Debra joins Rena Sherbill to discuss the evolution of the industry, the future of cannabis retail and what to focus on when choosing a cannabis ETF. We also discuss Debra's Green Market Summit happening this week and why it's focusing on the economics of cannabis brands. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
